attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1)Claims on second homes only.
2)Maximum threshold on furnishing of second homes(size & type of home used as deciding factor). This claim can only be made once with-in a set time span.
3)Claims to be made against the structure of 2nd home for the purpose of repairs and not upgrade (Max threshold applies as above).
4)No claims allowed for anything other than the building(no gardens,pools or moats etc).
5)Percentage of utility bills ALLOWED TO BE CLAIMED FOR(subject to threshold guidlines as above).
6)Reduced community charge liability upto75%.
7)Only 2nd homes allowed within the M25 area and only if you live further than 60 mile radius of London.
8)Commuting on public transport is claimable no threshold.
9)All claims must be proven with production of receipts.NO RECEIPT NO CLAIM.
10)Auditing office must be wholly indipendant.
11)All profits from sale of second home to be given to the treasury.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
